name: puppeteer-extension
description: Automate your browser without allowing websites to detect automated control.
author: maxwrlr

scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run build:node
scripts.build:extension: tsc --project tsconfig.ext.json && cp extension/manifest.json dist/extension/ && cp extension/popup.html dist/extension/
scripts.build:node: tsc --project tsconfig.node.json && cp package.json dist/nodejs/ && cp README.md dist/nodejs/
